Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 18th overall pick, by Ashburn in 1975...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1979, off Victor Lozano (LP)...

Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 2/2/1985 to a 2-year deal worth $537,600 per year...
